Name: Forwards Baseball Cap
Ability 1 Effect: Wit attack. Ranged. Targets 1. On success, deal 1 damage. If the target has been damaged by fastball 3 times during this combat, deal 2 damage instead.
Ability 2 Effect: You have a lot of baseballs.
Flavor Text: Three strikes and you're out... cold!

Name: Boxing Gear
Ability 1 Effect: Creatures that target you with an attack are dazed until the start of your next turn. Your Hit action deals 1 additional damage during your next turn.
Ability 2 Effect: After being defeated, you can have a dramatic moment that firmly establishes you as the crowd favorite
Flavor Text: Float like a butterfly, sting like a poisonous frog-eating butterfly.

Name: Wizard Glasses
Ability 1 Effect: Wit -> Wit. Melee. Targets 1. On success, deal 1 damage, then choose one of their hats. That hat's bonuses do not apply until the start of your next turn.
Ability 2 Effect: You can convincingly speak in a cryptic tongue that's meaningless to all of frog kind, including yourself.
Flavor Text: Say, that scar on your head looks like an intriguing novel premise.

Name: Dog Collar
Ability 1 Effect: Sproink attack. Melee. Targets 1. On success, deal 1 damage, then you and the target are stuck until the end of your next turn.
Ability 2 Effect: You have a tremendous sense of smell
Flavor Text: If you're into that kind of thing.

Name: Therapist's Glasses
Ability 1 Effect: Wit -> Wit. Ranged. Targets 1. On success, the target has a crisis of meaning and is dazed until the start of your next turn.
Ability 2 Effect: You are good at determining the emotions of creating that are speaking to you.
Flavor Text: I'm hearing that my attacking you is making you feel... attacked?

Name: Hockey Mask
Ability 1 Effect: Sproink attack. Melee. Targets 1. On success, deal 2 damage and you cannot use a hat action during your next turn.
Ability 2 Effect: After you deal damage, you can taunt your enemy or do an awesome dance that everybody loves!
Flavor Text: The penalty box is like a home away from home!
